name: Earth Wave
description:
You control the landscape, not the player. Change the amplitude and frequency of the wave to avoid obstacles and collect energy to keep running.

A game by Mathew Dwyer, Cohen Dennis, Georgia Wilkins, and Robert Preston.

HTML5 build is unoptimised. As such, it may take a while to load and be slow in browsers. Generally it should be fine but it's untested by us and thus your mileage may vary.
